Articles.Content:
Ominous presence.

Ever-watching eye.

Scary feeling, like if you were being constantly observed.
Jeez Geo-orbit must be terrifying, the "lake" will always be looking at your craft!

Perfect place to build an enourmours underwater colony in the middle of the "lake"

And call it "Pupil"

Eh: to me, it just looks like a really deformed cube.

Obscure jokes aside, I wonder if Puf might have a moon to which it is mutually tidally  locked, similar to how Sputnik Planitia is at the Charon antipode of the Pluto-Charon system.
Ahh... planet Mike... really curious if the land mass is a giant floating island or a pangaea style continent that is starting to drift apart.
for the design of the eye thing i think the surface looks boring. it would fit more on a more mysterious planet such as eve or jool type with more colors
